name: Purifire
description:
Follow Shiro on his journey toward achieving death in this lost world, in which he can neither die, nor truly live.

A 2D puzzle platformer made for the Home of Nerds Game Jam with the theme "dying is good". The base game was created within three days, development started on 10.02.2017 and concluded on 12.02.2017.

Made by WhaleBread, consisting of TodesBrot and Walictor.
